description.value: Living underground, you have learned to find your way without landmarks or even solid ground. If you roll a success on an Survival check to Sense Direction or an Athletics check to Climb, you get a critical success instead. You're not @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} when you attempt to Climb.
